text: Kyoṅki hameṅ ḳhabar milī hai ki āp ke Misr se nikalte waqt Rab ne Bahr-e-Qulzum kā pānī kis tarah āp ke āge ḳhushk kar diyā. Yih bhī hamāre sunane meṅ āyā hai ki āp ne Dariyā-e-Yardan ke mashriq meṅ rahne wāle do bādshāhoṅ Sīhon aur Oj ke sāth kyā kuchh kiyā, ki āp ne unheṅ pūrī tarah tabāh kar diyā.
